snippet.title: Shadowgate Remake Gameplay and First Impressions
snippet.description:
Gameplay and first impressions of the Shadowgate remake for the PC. As of recording and uploading this, the game was released two days ago. It is a remake/revision of the original Shadowgate, a point and click adventure game originally released on a variety of computers in the 1980's, as well as later the Nintendo Entertainment System and Game Boy Color. This remake was a Kickstarter-backed game, which is how I received my copy of the game. For those interested in checking it out, you can get it on Steam, or DRM free through other places like the Humble Store. Visit http://www.zojoi.com/ (the guys who made the game) for more information.

Social Media:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gameplayandtalk/
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/GameplayAndTalk
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/GameplayAndTalk/
Website: https://www.gameplayandtalk.com/ | RSS: https://www.gameplayandtalk.com/?format=rss

Schedule: 
- Live streams: I do my best to run these at least once a week on Sunday or Monday afternoons/nights, EST.
- Dedicated walkthroughs: I aim to have one of these up at least every two to three weeks, posted early morning Fridays or Saturdays.
- Any other content (like Q&A sessions) will pop up randomly, so keep an eye out for those.

Merch!
https://gameplayandtalk.creator-spring.com/

Intro music by PlayOnLoop.com.
